item.title: Workshop in Dresden in 2015
item.description:
The 4th Workshop on Parallel-in-Time Integration will take place in May 2015 in Dresden, Germany.

After three workshops in Lugano (2011), Manchester (2013) and Juelich (2014), the workshop series on parallel-in-time integration continues in 2015 with a workshop at TU Dresden from May 27 to May 29. For more information, check out the homepage at TU Dresden and the entry at parallelintime.org.

item.title: Example News Entry
item.description:
This is just an example of a news entry matching various categories. This first paragraph is just the teaser.

This second paragraph is the more detailed content.

You just write simple Markdown with all the fancy Octopress Plugins enabled.

In addition you can embed any GitHub repository via

{% githubrepo username/reponame %}

Example:

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo.
